summary: The 'Protocol Layer' of the application. Contains Zod schemas and TypeScript interfaces used by both Frontend and Backend.
context_hints: Modify this package when you need to change API contracts or Data Models
Run 'pnpm build' in this directory after changes to regenerate artifacts
Python models are generated from these Zod schemas

subdirectories.src: Source code containing Zod schema definitions.
subdirectories.python: Generated Python Pydantic models (do not edit manually).

key_files.src/index.ts: Main entry point exporting all types.
key_files.src/models.ts: AI Model configuration and metadata schemas.
key_files.src/tasks.ts: Task definitions for the Async Job system.

architecture_notes: Single Source of Truth (SSOT) pattern. Zod is the master definition.
